INSERT into items_comments ( id, user_id, item_id, item_name, item_spec_id, sepc_name, comment_level, content, created_time, updated_time )
VALUES
( #{item.commentId}, #{userId}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemSpecId}, #{item.itemSpecName}, #{item.commentLevel}, #{item.content}, now(), now() )

SELECT ic.id AS commentId, ic.content as content, ic.created_time as createdTime, ic.item_id as itemId, ic.item_name as itemName, ic.sepc_name as specName, ii.url as itemImg FROM items_comments as ic LEFT JOIN items_img as ii ON ic.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE ic.user_id = #{paramsMap.userId} AND ii.is_main = 1 ORDER BY ic.updated_time DESC
